original_text: Timothy, God has given you his true message to tell people. You must keep that message safe. Do not listen to people who say a lot of silly things that are not important to God. Those people think that they have special knowledge. But their ideas are against God's true message.
korean_text: 디모데야 망령되고 헛된 말과 거짓된 지식의 반론을 피함으로 네게 부탁한 것을 지키라

sentences.original_text: Timothy, God has given you his true message
sentences.korean_translation: 디모데야, 하나님께서 너에게 진실된 메시지를 주셨다

sentences.original_text: You must keep that message safe
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 메시지를 안전하게 지켜야 한다

sentences.original_text: who say a lot of silly things
that are not important to God
Those people think that they have special knowledge
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 특별한 지식이 있다고 생각한다

sentences.original_text: But their ideas are against God's true message
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들의 생각은 하나님의 진실된 메시지에 반대된다
